website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for warmer weather. Excellent back support and an adjustable chest strap, this is designed for maximum comfort.
pros: Great price point compared to other models
Rolls up to fit in a diaper bag
Mesh material is very breathable and good for warmer weather
cons: Need to purchase an infant insert separately

customer_reviews.title: Cute -  Not as Comfy as Expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and my baby is snug in there. I gave it less stars because it is difficult to snap the strap on the back without assistance and it seems to put more strain on my upper back and shoulders than my woven wrap carriers. So it’s easy because you just snap and go, but the actual snapping part can be kind of a pain . It’s easy to travel with, cute, and is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor K.

customer_reviews.title: Get the 360 Instead
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it was uncomfortable for me and my newborn. I bought the mesh gray newborn infant insert and used it with it but my baby's head still didn't come up out the top of it. I was always worried the baby would suffocate. It just didn't fit that well for us. I bought the ErgoBaby 360 and it's much more comfortable and the baby fits correctly in it. Even though the Performance was supposed to cut down on heat, I really felt there was no difference in how hot the baby and I were in this vs. the 360. Go for the 360.
customer_reviews.author: AnonyBits

customer_reviews.title: Near Impossible For Me To Use By Myself
customer_reviews.text: The buckle attached to the shoulder straps is impossible for me to buckle or unbuckle by myself. It was hot within seconds of putting it on, and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vark

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy carrier
customer_reviews.text: Great for carrying around our baby! Had to wait until she was about 9 pounds for her to fit with the infant booster. Just have to try to adjust to make sure it is fitted correctly so you don’t hurt your back and shoulders. Good quality, had it for 2 months with no complaints. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: emilyrose

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard on my back and is fairly easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Not too hard on my back and is fairly easy to use. I never really got the hang of buckling it when I carried my newborn in the front, so I needed help. My son ran really hot as an infant, though, and although comfortable, he would always sweat so much in it and got heat rash. If my son had a cooler body temperature and didn't sweat so much, it would have been great. I recommend it if you really want to baby wear, but don't buy more than one until you see if your child gets too hot in it.
customer_reviews.author: GA Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing carrier, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases we made. We still use it, now on our third child, and if I were to throw it through the wash again it would look brand new. Makes hiking and going for walks or to the zoo, etc much easier. I love the zipper section so you can put a small thing of wipes and a diaper, or your phone, or wallet (depending on how big yours is), or keys, or water bottle, or any combination thereof, inside while you're walking around. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Regina N.

customer_reviews.title: ... big and gave my baby no support or a good sitting position
customer_reviews.text: The carrier was a good product but not for petite or short torso people. I am 4 ft 11 and after pulling and tightening the shoulder straps all the way ; the ergo was too loose on my shoulders and my 6 month old 15 lbs baby didn't had the right support and body positioning. I Google about this issue and found that indeed ergo carriers are just not the best for people shorter than 5ft. I am giving 4 starts because the product was beautiful andhigh quality material plus fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: miroslava

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable up until babe gets to be about 20lbs or heavier
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this carrier when my son was smaller. Unfortunately the weight is not distributed properly and causes a feeling of heaviness and discomfort in my pelvis and private area. My son is now 24l-25bs so I really only wear him when I have to otherwise I cannot handle the uneven weight.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: I really want to like it, but
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like it, but... My 4 month old cries every time I put him in. He looks not comfortable in it. But if I hold his bottom and walk, he will calm down. Again, next time if I put him in, he still cries the first 5 minutes and looks at me seems asking why do you put me in it mom :/ It's much easier than holding my baby just by my arms, however, my back still hurts after having him in for 30 min roughly. The fabric is soft and the pattern looks great though.
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier, though hard to use at first
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to carry our 14mo on hikes up to 4 miles. Very comfortable to wear, and she's been quite happy in it. It's a bit difficult to get the baby into. The manual describes putting the baby in while side-wearing it and then shifting her around back. It does suggest practicing this, and I think it's right as I couldn't figure it out from the couple of illustrations it gave. So I think it's a bit hard to use. As I've only used it with my wife, she's put the baby in with me already wearing it on my back. Once the baby is in, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L

customer_reviews.title: must have!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves being carried in this. It allows me to be hands-free while providing baby with the secure feeling of being held. The front pocket is large enough for keys, phone, and even an extra diaper. The padding makes it easy on my shoulders and back. I live in warm climate and was worried the fabric might be too hot, but so far it is not a problem. i love the sea skipper pattern which is a nice light blue. The only complaint is from my husband who wants a more masculine color pattern. We love this carrier so much that we just ordered another in a color my husband likes.
customer_reviews.author: Arrived quickly

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I would give this five stars but they don't make this plus size friendly which sucks. So my husband uses this to hold our daughter. Make sure if you have a newborn you get the booster with it. We didn't know you needed one so make sure you get that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have this and the infant insert and I have been using this since my son was born (he’s now 3.5 months). It is very well made and very supportive. Once I set the straps to fit me, it’s an easy on and off process. My little guy is happy in it and I feel safe wearing him, as I feel it is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: XFitLauren

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for wearing anytime. Great in hot humid Miami or hiking in Maine mountains. Great for Disney you can stand in line hands free and if they are asleep leave them in it for kids rides. We have used this for 3-4 years and it's held up well. Easy to wash. The pocket holds keys, iPhone, 2 diapers, zip lock of baby wipes and a bag of goldfish. I have used it newborn to 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Used my ergo for 2-2.5 years then handed down to my sister who has used it the past 2 years. Awesome durability, so helpful with little ones, and not super confusing to put on. My only complaint is that I really like the lumbar support on a different brand of carrier I have also. But would definitely recommend to any mama who needs a free hand during the day!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kate Niznik

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love, but didn't fit me.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love the ergo carrier. However, every time I wore it I felt like it was too big for me. The waistband sat too far down and hit the top of my thighs when walking up stairs, etc. Baby seemed comfortable though and my husband liked this carrier. I ended up returning for the Pognae carrier which is basically the exact same design but fits a smaller frame and feels much more comfortable on me (I have a short torso). I also like the simple design of the Pognae better and it is cheaper (additional bonus!).
customer_reviews.author: Susan85

customer_reviews.title: Served it's purpose for the most part...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, pretty durable, easy to clean. As a single mom I also discovered too late that it is very difficult to not only put this on, but to get baby into it safely, all by yourself. For someone who has a lot of help I would imagine it would work pretty well. Also not as comfortable as they make it out to be. Really pulls on your shoulders no matter which way you wear it. Overall, it served its purpose. I was able to use it when my son was very small. I don't know that I got enough use out of it to justify the price though...
customer_reviews.author: crimsonbutterflies

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby carrier, it's hands free and I can go anywhere without a bulky carseat. Super light and soft material. My husband uses it too, but it did take him a while to get a hang of it but he agrees that it's really nice to use out shopping. The few negatives I could say would be that it gets to warm and the back band of the carrier should be much more supportive or cushioned at least.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY AND PERFECTLY FUNCTIONAL
customer_reviews.text: Rarely do I write reviews, but I would be remiss I didn't sing my praises of this carrier! Not only is the fabric made to make the modern momma look haute, it is made of tough and yet still soft cotton fabric. Stitched with quality, the moment I put my baby inside she seemed comfortable and relaxed. I LOVE the shade feature for baby's nap time or just or use when it's sunny. This carrier supports my back better than any other carrier I've tried. Easy to put on and take off. I'm looking forward to using this beautiful carrier for the next 4 years!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: It is quite comfortable. Don't imagine you won't feel hot with this ...
customer_reviews.text: It is quite comfortable. Don't imagine you won't feel hot with this carrier, it is lighter but still you will feel hot. I love the sun hood since I walk with my girl and she falls asleep as soon as we get outside, so I can cover her nicely. And the side zippered pocket is heaven when I go to the store, since I can put there a small wallet and my phone without having to carry also a purse
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic carrier. Amazing customer service from Ergo
customer_reviews.text: Our 10-month old has loved this carrier since he was a newborn and we used the special insert. It has been his favorite carrier, and we appreciate the sunshine cover and zipper pocket to stash things in. It is easy to use alone and is well made. The only thing we may have done differently is pick another color; ours is black, and it can get hot on sunny summer days, something we did not consider when purchasing. When we had called the manufacturer for about spare parts, they gave amazing customer service. Definitely a recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: John AKA Cali

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, works well
customer_reviews.text: After using a friend's Ergo Performance carrier, we decided to purchase one also. Our son falls asleep in it almost instantly when he's in it, so that tells me he has no complaints on comfort. It is also comfortable to wear out and around the house to enable some multitasking to get done and hands free activities. We have only used it in the front carry position so far but it's nice to know that it will grow and be able to be used when our child gets older in the back or side carry positions. Can get a little hot on a long walk or hike in high temps, but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Markovich

customer_reviews.title: Good investment. Must-have for hikers/walkers.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful during those time I needed to get out a take a walk for some fresh air. Just recently discovered the side-carry position, which my 5-month-old boy is much happier about since the front-carry stopped being satisfactory for him a couple months ago. I look forward to when he gets bigger and can ride in the back-carry position. This is a great investment for those who take walks/hikes and must take baby along.
customer_reviews.author: Web Shopr

customer_reviews.title: This baby carrier is amazing! I no longer feel like I my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: This baby carrier is amazing! I no longer feel like I my daughter may fall out of a baby carrier while she is in it (like we have with previous baby carriers). Great for carrying your child, and it is a great carrier if they fall asleep, because it actually holds them close to you and you do not have to do extra holding when they fall asleep. this one can even go in the pool, it is machine washable (hang to dry).
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I don't get why this product is so expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Big whoop, Ergo baby. I don't understand what the fuss is about with this carrier. Yeah, it's somewhat more comfortable than the cheap ones but not worth 6 times the price, in my opinion. Also, it sucks that you can't position the baby to face forward. My baby was happy against my chest for about 2 months of her life and from then on, she's way too interested in what's going on around her to be happy in the Ergo. I have had to buy a different carrier to hold her facing forward now. I kick myself every time I see the Ergo in my baby's closet.
customer_reviews.author: E/V Black

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product, it works well for my daughter and my wife, the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it doesn't work well for dads or granddads. The girth on a bigger male frame only works on the side and even then may not be comfortable to the baby. A little more detail on how to set up the carrier in all the different positions would also be helpful, I had to turn to YouTube which was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: JDog

customer_reviews.title: 360 Version is BETTER for Nosey Babies... like mine
customer_reviews.text: The 360 version of this carrier is MUCH BETTER! Returning this one. Baby can only face towards you. My baby is NOSEY so this one doesn’t work for us. He can’t turn and look and engage. We didn’t like this one but LOVE the 360.
customer_reviews.author: Rasheda D

customer_reviews.title: BEST Baby Carrier!
customer_reviews.text: I totally fell in love with this baby carrier as soon as it arrived! I had purchased a Baby Bjorn carrier previously. It was very uncomfortable and just didn't seem to fit right. The Ergo Baby carrier is so comfortable and so versatile. I love the multiple carrying positions (front, side/hip, and back). I put my 2 year old in it just to see how comfortable it was with extra weight. It was GREAT! The thick padded straps didn't dig into my shoulders at all. If you are looking for a baby carrier...this is the one to get! You will NOT regret it!
customer_reviews.author: drmstr07

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Saves my arms from holding my baby. Get to do things and have my kid with me.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: love it love it love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my Bijorn (with the lumbar support pad) like crazy, my new son is WAY clingy, and I've been getting worse and worse burning upper back pain...and then I ordered the Ergo and guess what...my back isn't killing me any more. The first day I wore it I felt the teeniest bit of fatigue in my hips and not a single twinge of pain in my back. Now 1 week later I feel completely normal in it. I love the Ergo, I wish I had spent the money on it with my first child instead of battling through the Bjorn back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Ergo is good brand, but mesh bugs me.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the mesh on the inside. It is uncomfortable on my back if I'm wearing a racer back shirt or spaghetti strap top. I suspect it is uncomfortable on baby's legs as well. It's harder to fold up so it ends up taking more storage space. I like Ergo overall, I just wish I had gotten a regular one, or a Beco, instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs Jewell

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a baby carrier and couldn't believe what a great deal this was
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time mom and trying to find baby items that are a little cheaper in price is hard to do. I was looking for a baby carrier and couldn't believe what a great deal this was! Target was selling a not so cute one for over $100. I absolutely love this pattern and it's more of a blue than sea foam green. Very gender neutral and my husband is all for it since it doesn't look girly!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby and Natalia James

customer_reviews.title: Live it!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! This Ergo carrier is a dream come true for us. It's comfortable to wear (our 6 month old weighs 23 lbs) and is great for around the house, going grocery shopping, hiking, and soothing our little guy when he needs to be held while I'm attending to our other children.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R Friedly

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this! I have 3 kids now (I know it says mom of 2 lol) I put my infant in this whenever we go somewhere. I don't have to push around a stroller, It gives me 2 free hands. My back and shoulders don't hurt at all and haven't, I've worn it for 20 minutes and I've worn it for a whole day. This was the best purchase I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: I really liked it. It was very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it. It was very comfortable, however my baby hated it. He cried every time I put him in it, didn't like feeling confined. So if your baby likes to be wrapped up and secure, it will probably be great for you, but if your baby likes to move around more and doesn't like being confined, you probably want a different carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We really would have enjoyed forward facing on the front
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carrier prior to the 360 being released. The only negative comments I have are that there are only two positions to carry my child. We really would have enjoyed forward facing on the front. Other than that, it is durable, comfortable, washes easily, and has held up for numerous hikes that always last a minimum of two hours. I do not leave the house without it!
customer_reviews.author: dlrc

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this baby carrier. I have hips. I felt the other carriers on the market were too small, horrible, awkward, and even some dangerous. Then I found this. Perfect. Plus it had extension to buy to add a couple inches for us bigger hip people. I cannot say enough good things about it. Has a couple little pockets to stash some things, a hood for sun/rain protection too. The insert for newborns works great. The best there is.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Goblin

customer_reviews.title: best carrier there is
customer_reviews.text: best carrier there is. Make sure you actually watch the videos on youtube about how to properly put it on though, becuase it's really easy to think its on right and its not as comfy as it could be if you put it on correctly. perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Owen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the ergo! So glad I bought this. I have tried many carriers and this one is the best. It is so comfortable to use, never hurts my back and baby is comfortable too. Also, it's very easy to put on and get baby in, some other carriers can be hard to figure out. I also really like the anchor design and get lots of compliments when I'm using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this to carry my son in. I had another Ergobaby 6 years ago with my daughter. They make a great carrier. Both my husband and I enjoy wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Cannot love without this now
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this wrap and so did I! It took the strain off my back, which many of my other "wraps" caused. Only draw back is, it can get a little warm in the summer (depending on where you live ofcourse) but I put an ice pack in the front pouch which seemed to help. Added bonus, pair with a breastfeeding cover and nurse while you walk! Haha!!
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle Leigh

customer_reviews.title: So awesome, worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier! I use it at least once a day! My daughter loves being in it and falls asleep in it often! I can nurse easily in it and most of the time people dont even know she's eating! I have also used it carrying her on my back and she loves that as well. I can wear her in it for hours and not have any strain on my back or shoulders. For reference she is 11 months, 20 pounds and 29 inches long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a must have for any parent!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Ergo. I use it everyday and sometimes it's the only thing that will calm down my son. It is great for grocery shopping, around the airport, walking, doing chores around the house! My son often falls asleep while in it. It fits great and best of all your body doesn't hurt from wearing your baby! It's also great for nursing the baby discretely. Often times people just think he is asleep! Love my Ergo, it's the one thing I couldn't live w/o.
customer_reviews.author: Laorquidia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier, baby seems comfortable and I'm comfortable. The print is adorable. Color as shown. I didn't buy the infant insert, I just rolled up a receiving blanket as others had suggested and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaZ

customer_reviews.title: loved it since he was a newborn (you need to ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old loves to sleep in this thing, loved it since he was a newborn (you need to buy a separate newborn insert). Great for cheater naps. Very comfortable for me too. I get compliments on the pattern all the time. FYI this carrier does not let baby face outward.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I received the fake one- from Toystax. I never could use it for my first kid in 2012- and just had my second kid and needed a waist extender, so was trying to figure out the product details, and read the reviews. My logo does not match and as far as I can remember- there was no instructional video. I am still going to call amazon regarding this product- even though I bought it in 2012, as they should be verifying the products that they are selling.
customer_reviews.author: Zar

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Didn't start using it until he was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Didn't start using it until he was big enough to not need an infant insert, but it's been a great investment. Great for grocery shopping and traveling to places where you'll do a lot of walking. Comfortable for myself and dad to use, easy to adjust, and my son frequently falls asleep in it. Great for naps on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Travels

customer_reviews.title: Love this carrier!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier, my wife and I can both comfortably wear it. Our baby loves it too and almost immediately falls asleep in it, great sleepy dust! The pattern is one my wife loves and I have to say I do too. Love that there are different carrying positions and I can't wait to use them all!
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby item ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Ergo and use it every day! In my house we call it the "Magic put the baby to sleep machine". When she is fussy and noting else will make her happy, I put her in the Ergo (with the infant insert, sold separately) and give her a binki and she immediately falls asleep! And I have my hands free to do chores! This is absolutely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Silva

customer_reviews.title: Wish I hadn't waited 8 months to buy this! ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I hadn't waited 8 months to buy this! I tried a cheaper brand when my son was 2 months old and it totally killed my back! With this, I can carry my 14 month old around and it doesn't bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: K. MCDONALD

customer_reviews.title: Love the Ergo!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Ergo! We had the baby Bjorne when my son was first born, but he grew out of it before his first birthday. The Ergo is also much more comfortable when the child gets bigger since it distributes the weight and isn't all riding on your shoulders. I still like the baby Bjorne, we just out grew it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used a Bjorn Sport with my son and honestly just thought it was supposed to be that uncomfortable to baby wear. When I switched to the ERGO with my daughter, the difference is amazing. It definitely takes some practice to get it on/off while wrangling a squirmy baby, but it is so comfortable to wear. I haven't tried wearing it on my back or side yet as my daughter is still too young.
customer_reviews.author: SMG

customer_reviews.title: Love the sea skipper print
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Ergo I have owned. The only reason I got rid of my first one was to get a different print, the sea skipper print. I absolutely love this print and even the shoulder pads are fluffier than my other one. My husband even wears our youngest and enjoys wearing him.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Must have baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: I have one myself and bought one for my sister in law. Highly recommended for children 6 months to 2 years when they don't like carriers anymore. Essential for getting anything done around the house, traveling, shopping, etc. very comfy for me and for baby. Ergonomic for child. Must have baby item.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyB

customer_reviews.title: Kind of hot
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier and i love the pattern. However it gets pretty hot especially with the insert. I bought the Lillie baby airflow so I will see how that compares. I have a feeling this will be especially hot during the summer since I live in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good for BF moms
customer_reviews.text: I was so hesitant to buy due to price but I'm so glad I did. I use this- with the insert- DAILY. I LOVE IT and so does my baby. I had a bjorn with my first born and after reading about hip dysplasia, I didn't wanna use it w my 2nd! The ergo is a lifesaver and I even turn the insert sideways and am able to nurse in it!!!
customer_reviews.author: stacynau

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my Ergo and LOVE this pattern
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my Ergo and LOVE this pattern!! So easy to wear my baby using this carrier!! The color isn't what it looked like to me when I ordered it. To me the picture looks like a shade of green but it is actually lighter than a baby blue. I actually like the color more than I did in the picture (But blue is my fav color)!!
customer_reviews.author: Julene

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This pack is great for back relief with heavy babies!! However, my son only wanted to be carried forward facing by the age of 5.5-6 months, so then this became another item stuffed in the closet. I am hoping when he is a little older (now 7.5 mo) that I can use it again as a backpack carrier?
customer_reviews.author: HauteMomsCloset

customer_reviews.title: secured baby and hands free mommy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier! My 4 month old is currently 16 lbs and fits perfectly in it. The carrier is designed to distribute weight accordingly and is easy on your back and shoulders unlike other carriers I have tried. I have worn it grocery shopping, through the airport, on the beach and hiking. I feel like she is very secure in there and it's great to be hands free! The material is easy to clean and the little front zipper pocket fits my keys, cell phone, extra wipes and a diaper even!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Q

customer_reviews.title: They love being able to keep their teething babies close and ...
customer_reviews.text: My girls told me this is the one to have. They love being able to keep their teething babies close and still have free hands to get things done. They also love to hike which this has proven to be wonderful for. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Scarberry

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: so comfortable to wear, this puts all the weight on your hips instead of having a traditional one where most of the weight does across your back. Once I figured out how to put my son in here, I use it everyday! You can wear it multiple ways and is WELL WORTH the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Carries my baby very well. It seems to be very comfortable for both him and me. He falls asleep in it all the time whether I'm doing yard work, hiking or just hanging around the house. The mesh material is awesome. Keeps us decently cool even on days that are 80degrees +.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: perfect baby limo
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get baby in and out, range of three positions allows wearer to move baby around when muscles get tired. Used extensively to carry baby 24 lbs all day while touring castles in Germany. 3-4 hours on back and neither dad nor baby had issues.
customer_reviews.author: dicesurf

customer_reviews.title: My son hated every single one except this one we are both ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my third and final purchase of a baby carrier. My son hated every single one except this one we are both in love with it and it is very easy to breast feed him with this carrier. Very comfortable to wear also. Love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Martorana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carrier
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the Ergo! I used this carrier from newborn to 3 years and it was comfortable. Both of my girls loved being "worn" in it. I used it mainly for back carrying as they got older and I never felt any discomfort. The front pocket is great for stashing credit cards, car keys, and anything else you may need while out and about. Super easy to use and wear the babies. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Blakely

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it fits and doesn't make me feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it fits and doesn't make me feel like I'm carrying a baby on my stomach. Spreads the weight out nicely. I like how easy it is to get baby into and how there is no hard plastic next to his face, unlike another brand I tried had.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product & I've tried a few!!  Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Works excellently! I have comfortably front-packed a snugly 30 lb chubby 8 month old for 5 hours at a time! The additional support at the base makes it stand out from others I've tried. He enjoys the closeness, falling asleep happily & securely snuggled in. Haven't conquered the sideways option but we will!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: BEST CARRIER IN THE MARKET.
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is so awesome i run out of words for it. Very well made, great quality, ergonomic (I have scoliosis and it doesn't hurt my back at all) and my toddler (3 years) loves it as well as our little 4 month old. They both love it so much we are thinking of getting a second one. This is well worth the money, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Our 4th carrier---success at last!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this carrier after using two New Native slings (which were great for the newborn stage) and a Baby Bjorn carrier. The way that the baby's weight is distributed with the Ergo makes for a comfortable carry. Plus, I was able to nurse discretely while carrying him. We will no doubt be getting an additional one for our twins.
customer_reviews.author: AmaranthRose

customer_reviews.title: Item was not what it was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this was a knock off that wasn't the original item. It was a gift, too. The cousin did well to contact Amazon and they worked very well to resolve this issue. Who knew?!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: ok carrier
customer_reviews.text: I got this because so many people raved about them but my son does not really like being in it. I started putting him in it around 10 months after using the baby Bjorn. While it is more comfortable for me, it can be hard to get him in and out. He also doesn't like sitting so low. He is much happier in a backpack carrier where his head is up near mine.
customer_reviews.author: acs

customer_reviews.title: Only thing i dislike is the nursing cover flap
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to side wear while i cook. it saved my sanity & my son loves to "get in his pouch" when i cook. Only thing i dislike is the nursing cover flap. i dont need it, its annoying, and it cannot be detached.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: A very soft and comfortable carrier. Amazing big pocket in front allows you to store a couple of diapers/tissues and a wallet. Makes it easy to leave home without a bag
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had acid reflux as a newborn, and this carrier was a life saver. My daughter wouldn't sleep on her back, and wanted to be comforted a lot. The ergo allowed me to keep her upright, let her sleep comfortably, and let me be completely hands free. With the moby, I was still concerned about her head when I was leaning over to do laundry. The ergo, when using the head cover flap, kept her tightly secure. I have only two issues with the carrier. One, is that she must remain facing me, and now that she is older, she'd prefer to face out. Two, it is really hot for her and me in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B

customer_reviews.title: Light and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love how light this product is. And how well it fits. The reason why I rated it 3 stars is because I find it quite difficult to transition from front, to side, to back. And the additional infant insert is definitely needed. It would also be nice if your child could sit facing forward while in the front.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it! No problems. Got mine because I borrowed one from a friend and HAD TO GET MYSELF ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Shumway

customer_reviews.title: Ergobaby Carrier
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this carrier as a gift for our son and his growing family. They love it and say the baby is very comfortable in it and falls asleep every time they use it. They found other carriers not as comfortable for them or the baby.
customer_reviews.author: V M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, but still hot. We use the infant insert, also performance mesh, and we are both sweating like crazy in the summer heat. It's hard to tell if my three week old is getting any airflow with the mesh, might be just as good as the regular version. Back saver and easily adjusted for husband and myself.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: unless you live in a super hot area
customer_reviews.text: A little roomier than the original ergo...it is cooler than the original. Not worth upgrading to if you already have the original though, unless you live in a super hot area. I don't recommend for 0-3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Gilligan16

customer_reviews.title: Love this carrier
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier. Use it all the time to carry my baby. She loves and and can fall asleep easily in it. Have not tried the 360 to compare but definitely like it better than the baby bjorn. I like how it rests on my hips to support weight like a hiking backpack. May seem bulky putting it on and taking it off but after awhile I can do it super fast. Would recommend it to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: bunny01

customer_reviews.title: Great design.
customer_reviews.text: The design is beautiful, and it is very comfortable to wear. I only needed the infant insert for a few days, and my little girl seems to like riding around in it!
customer_reviews.author: C.Welton

customer_reviews.title: Was not as comfortable fit as the ergo original
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Was not as comfortable fit as the ergo original. The front belt area is slightly bigger too so felt annoying.
customer_reviews.author: RanyA

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to child in as I would have hoped
customer_reviews.text: This does give terrific back support for large baby's like ours who liked to be held alot. However it's not exactly easy to get the kid in it. And getting the strap that holds your shoulder straps together is nearly impossible without the assistance of another person. That's really the only flaw though but it's a pretty major one since I imagine that's a major purpose of it. If I had extra hands I wouldn't need this thing in the first place. Very durable and well made. Will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Fox

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: With two under two this has to be one of my best purchases so far!! Living in Hawaii the mesh fabric is perfect for hot days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Best carrier I've ever worn. Can't wait to use it more. And I'm the type of mom who IS NOT a fan of baby wearing (not against baby wearing at all, it's just not my style).
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Patrick Eames

customer_reviews.title: Love it but....
customer_reviews.text: Bought the ergo baby because I didn't like the mobey and other types of carriers. My boss recommended ergo baby. When I bought it, I loved it! Easy to use. However, I realized that my baby girl likes to look around...I wish it had a front facing feature. I tried the hip place position...it was a bit confusing...but I'm sure after time, I'll get the hang of it. I LOVE the pokets and the hood. I use it when I got to the market real quick or as a back up to the stroller when she wants to get out.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin Xtina

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd purchased this sooner
customer_reviews.text: I got this when my daughter was close to 2 but I recommend getting it much sooner. At nearly 4, she is still small enough to fit at 35 lbs but she doesn't need many rides anymore. This is easy to use, secure, steady, would use with a new baby and then keep using it through toddlerhood. Maybe next time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: and it's still in perfect shape. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product over a year ago,and it's still in perfect shape. Thank you,ergo!!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister and her baby is 30lbs and fits perfectly! this is a high quality product and is very sturdy. Cant go wrong here
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Arceneaux

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Ergo!!!! I recommend it to every mom I run into.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dominis

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: We love our carrier! Easy to use. Not uncomfortable to wear! Has a wide range of sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for baby and me
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for baby and me, but a little challenging to get on and adjusted to a comfortable place without help, which is kind of pointless since I wear it most when I'm home with the kids alone.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: This is great! I was using a friends 360
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I was using a friends 360, but didn't want to spend the money. I think I actually like this one better, not as bulky and just as comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: JJ Rumley

customer_reviews.title: Baby Carrier
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to add to the "wish list" for my grandson as my daughter was expecting her first baby. It is a wonderful product and I would heartily recommend it to anyone as a gift or addition to an already existing baby registry.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R Crnovich

customer_reviews.title: perfect baby shower gift for him
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to a soon to be dad, he loved it and the pattern is even better in person. Was happy to buy from Amazon as they are an authorized Ergo dealer so I knew I wasn't getting a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: great for babies and toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought an ergo three years ago and have used it several times a week since. I carried my older daughter until she was 2 years old and 25 pounds. (I would have kept carrying her, but I was too pregnant.) I have had my second daughter in it since she was 2 weeks old. I can't say enough about it. I have tried five other slings/ carriers and all were uncomfortable for me or my children.
customer_reviews.author: Horse Mom

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Ergo
customer_reviews.text: I went though 3 baby carriers and I love my Ergo best. My daughter is 9 months and we still use and love it. When you have a child nap time can prevent you from leaving the house, but having the Ergo allows my daughter to take naps when I am out doing errand or taking a walk. Another great feature is that it is comfortable. Other carriers hurt my shoulders, but with the Ergo the weight of the baby is distributed evenly throughout my body. Another great feature is the snap on hood. The hood protects the baby from the sun and gives the baby proper head support. Buy it and you will be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: kqs

customer_reviews.title: A Winner !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend for her baby shower and now I wish I had one with mine! It offers 3 positions and helps distribute the weight between your back and hips etc. She loves it and has told me it is everything you need and more in a baby carrier!
customer_reviews.author: Madame

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift they were very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift they were very pleased with it, ergo is a great company I modeled for them during a local convention and they are really nice people who sell quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Delma R. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Best Carrier
customer_reviews.text: I love the Performance Ergo! It is easy to put on, light weight and breaths well. It's versatile as far as carrying your little one in front, side, or back. The pockets are great and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: LWY

product_meta.title: Ergobaby Original Award Winning Ergonomic Multi-Position Baby Carrier with X-Large Storage Pocket, Aussie Khaki
product_meta.description: Color:Aussie KhakiThe classic, Ergobaby Original baby carrier is comfortable and great for carrying older babies on your back. It has a big storage pocket to carry all your essentials while on the go. This award-winning baby keeps your baby ergonomically seated in multiple carry positions (front- inward, hip and back carry). The 100% cotton fabric is soft and cozy for the ultimate in plush comfort. The carrier easily adjusts to fit petite to larger body types, and the lumbar support waistbelt provides the lower back support you need. Includes UPF baby hood for sun protection, privacy and easy breastfeeding. Ergobaby stands by our products with our ErgoPromise Guarantee. If you find a manufacturing or material defect, Ergobaby will replace your carrier at no charge. Most 360 Carriers are eligible for the Everlove by Ergobaby Carrier Buyback program.
feature_bullets: BEST FOR BACK CARRY: The classic, Ergobaby Original baby carrier is comfortable and great for carrying older babies on your back (12-45 lbs./ 5.5-20 kg)
MULTIPLE CARRY POSITIONS: Inward, Hip & Back Carry
100% PREMIUM COTTON: Soft and cozy for the ultimate in comfort
STORAGE: Extra large zippered storage pocket for keys, phone, and more
COMFORT: Long-wearing comfort with lumbar suppor waistbelt & cushy shoulder straps distribute weight evenly between hips and shoulders.
ERGOPROMISE: If you find a manufacturing or material defect, Ergobaby will replace your carrier or part at no charge.

FILL HEARTS, NOT LANDFILLS: Everlove by Ergobaby is a first of its kind baby carrier buyback and restoration program. Ergobaby buys back your previously loved Ergobaby carriers and breathes new life into them for new families to enjoy.

specifications.Care instructions: Machine washable: Cold with mild detergent on gentle cycle. Dry on delicate cycle and remove when seams are still damp. Air dry.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars743 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
